story.book

Class StoryInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • story.book.StoryInfo

  • public class StoryInfo
extends java.lang.Object
    Class representing additional information about a Story object. Contains fields such as author, title, genre, etc. of the story in addition to information for identifying the story.
    Author:
    Alexander Cheung
    See Also:
    Story

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      (package private) static class  StoryInfo.PublishState
      Defines the different publishing states of the story.
